articles.author: Kurt Schussler, Winnie Hsu
articles.title: Nvidia Supplier Stocks Drop on Latest China Export Restrictions - Bloomberg
articles.description: Asian technology stocks fell after Nvidia Corp. said the US government will begin requiring a license to export its H20 chips to China, an escalation of restrictions.
articles.content:
Asian technology stocks fell after Nvidia Corp. said the US government will begin requiring a license to export its H20 chips to China, an escalation of restrictions.
